        topic - Chosen topic of server
        Returns:
        Finished register PDU

      • alive

        public static PDU alive(int id,
        int nrOfClients)
        Creates alive PDU. Server -> DNS this PDU is used to inform the DNS that the server is still up and running.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique number of the server, recived by the DNS.
        nrOfClients - Number of connected clients.
        Returns:
        Alive PDU

      • message

        public static PDU message(int msgType,
          java.lang.String text,
          byte[] cryptKey)
                   throws WrongCryptTypeException,
                          java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Creates message PDU Client <-> Server Used for transferring a string of text
        Parameters:
        msgType - Type of message, check MsgTypes class for available types.
        text - Message in form of a string.
        cryptKey - Encryption key.
        Returns:
        message PDU
        Throws:
        WrongCryptTypeException - If the encryption key is unsupported.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - If the named charset is not supported
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error has occurred.

                              java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Compressed string in form of raw data array
        Throws:

      • checksum

        public static boolean checksum(PDU pdu,
               int index)
        Calculates a new checksum of a PDU and compares it to the existing checksum in the PDU.
        Parameters:
        pdu - The PDU that is going to be checked.
        index - The position in the PDU of were the existing checksum is.
        Returns:
        Whatever if the checksum matches.
